text.text_translated: The Hunger Games is a story set in the future. North America was destroyed and the new country is called Panem. Panem has twelve poor districts and a rich city called the Capitol. The Capitol runs the whole country. Each district must make different things for the Capitol. District 12 gives all the coal (a black rock used for energy) to the country. There was also a thirteenth district. That district fought the Capitol, so it was destroyed.

best_attempt.text_translated:
The Hunger Games is a story.  
It is set in the future after North America was destroyed.  
The country is called Panem.  
Panem has twelve poor districts and a rich city called the Capitol.  
The Capitol rules the whole country.  
Each district must make different things for the Capitol.  
District 12 gives all the black rock for energy to the country.  
There was also a thirteenth district.  
It rebelled against the Capitol, and the Capitol destroyed it.
